DDSL Lambda Workload Generator
==============================

Usage
=====

Installation
============

Install using pip:

.. code:: bash

   $ pip install ddsl-lambda-wg

Upgrading:

.. code:: bash

   pip install ddsl-lambda-wg --upgrade
